DOC.brief_summary: The primary objectives of this study are to assess bronchodilator efficacy as determined by FEV1, the effect on dyspnoea as determined by the BDI/TDI, the effect on health status as determined bt the SGRQ and the effect on COPD exacerbations
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Main: Diagnosis of COPD Postbronchodilator FEV1<80% predicted and FEV1/FVC<70% predicted Exclusion criteria: Main: Significant other diseases then COPD Recent MI Any unstable or lifethreatening cardiac arrythmia requiring intervention or change in drug therapy during the past year Hospitalisation for cardiac failure during the past year History of asthma
